creditline: Gift of John Taylor and Rachel McNamara
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: central beaded section with predominately blue and white beads, accented with red, in the form of two braid-like loops, stripes of beadwork on the loops and alternating short rows of blue and white beads on either side of loops; long sections on either end of rows of cowrie shells edges with larger blue and white beads; large blue bead at each end; tan cloth backing
medium: Cowrie shells, beads, cotton (?), plant fibers
title: Belt
